Compared to other editions of ''Minecraft'', {{LCE}} uses different [[panorama]]s exclusive to that edition. These were usually taken from inside the most recent tutorial world. This page documents all of them.

== Build 0016 ==
[[File:Build 0016 Panorama Background S.png|The build 0016 panorama|none|frame]]

The panorama was introduced in [[Xbox 360 Edition 1.66.0016.0]]. This one was to [[Xbox 360 Edition 1.66.0035.0]].

== Build 0054 ==
[[File:Build 0054 Panorama Background N.png|The night version of the build 0054 panorama|none|frame]][[File:Build 0054 Panorama Background S.png|The daytime version of the build 0054 panorama|none|frame]]

In [[Xbox 360 Edition 0.66.0054.0]], the panorama was changed to the tutorial world. A night version of the panorama was also added.

These panoramas were used for versions from [[Xbox 360 Edition 0.66.0054.0]] to [[Xbox 360 Edition TU4]].
== TU5 ==
[[File:TU5 Panorama Background S.png|none|frame|The daytime version of the TU5 panorama]]
[[File:TU5 Panorama Background N.png|none|frame|The night version of the TU5 panorama]]
In [[Xbox 360 Edition]], these panoramas were used for versions [[Xbox 360 Edition TU5|TU5]] and [[Xbox 360 Edition TU6|TU6]].
